data.description: Beautifies output from XML::Writer et al;
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Beautifies (formats) the output from XML::Writer, since that
    outputs one long line of XML, and any other XML document that needs
    to be formatted to be human readable. This helps debug XML/Data
    problems. This is unique as nothing on CPAN does such as thing for
    any SGML that I was able to find. PS: This relies on another module
    I just applied for a namespace on. That is Log::AndError. Any chance
    you can push that through at the same time if it hasn't already been
    done. Tom
